abstract: Thai prosecutors indict 72 people on charges of participation in human trafficking syndicate; suspects include military general and other officials.
lead_paragraph: The indictments come days before the State Department is expected to release an analysis of international efforts to fight such smuggling networks.

headline.main: Thailand Charges 72 With Human Trafficking Crimes Ahead of U.S. Report
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Thailand: Prosecutors Indict 72 on Human-Trafficking Charges

snippet: The indictments come days before the State Department is expected to release an analysis of international efforts to fight such smuggling networks.
